text: @CNN Microwave ovens operate at 2.45 GHz. That translates to a wavelength of about 12cm. A coronavirus diameter is on the order of 120nm. That is 100,000th of the wavelength. Would have no effect on the proteins or the bilipid layer structure. Might boil off any transport water.
